00019 class MinimumFunction: public std::binary_function<I_BYTE, I_BYTE, I_BYTE>
00020 {
00021 public:
00022        inline I_BYTE operator()(const I_BYTE& value1, const I_BYTE& value2)
00023        {
00024               return istd::Min(value1, value2);
00025        }
00026 };

00029 class MaximumFunction: public std::binary_function<I_BYTE, I_BYTE, I_BYTE>
00030 {
00031 public:
00032        inline I_BYTE operator()(const I_BYTE& value1, const I_BYTE& value2)
00033        {
00034               return istd::Max(value1, value2);
00035        }
00036 };

00042 template <typename PixelType, class CompareFunction> 
00043 class TMorphoProcessorComp: public iipr::TImageParamProcessorCompBase<IMultidimensionalFilterParams>
00044 {
00045 public:
00046        typedef iipr::TImageParamProcessorCompBase<IMultidimensionalFilterParams> BaseClass;
00047 
00048 protected:           
00049        // reimplemented (iipr::TImageParamProcessorCompBase<iipr::IMultidimensionalFilterParams>)
00050        virtual bool ParamProcessImage(
00051                             const IMultidimensionalFilterParams* paramsPtr,
00052                             const iimg::IBitmap& inputImage,
00053                             iimg::IBitmap& outputImage);
00054

00060 // reimplemented (iipr::TImageParamProcessorCompBase<iipr::IMultidimensionalFilterParams>)
00061 
00062 template <typename PixelType, class CompareFunction> 
00063 bool TMorphoProcessorComp<PixelType, CompareFunction>::ParamProcessImage(
00064                      const IMultidimensionalFilterParams* paramsPtr,
00065                      const iimg::IBitmap& inputImage,
00066                      iimg::IBitmap& outputImage)
00067 {
00068        if (paramsPtr == NULL){
00069               return false;
00070        }
00071 
00072        imath::CVarVector filterLengths = paramsPtr->GetFilterLengths();
00073        int filterDimensionsCount = filterLengths.GetElementsCount();
00074        if (filterDimensionsCount < 1){
00075               return false;
00076        }
00077 
00078        bool retVal = true;
00079 
00080        int kernelHalfWidth = int(filterLengths[0] * 0.5 - 0.5);
00081        int kernelHalfHeight = (filterDimensionsCount < 2)? kernelHalfWidth: int(filterLengths[1] * 0.5 - 0.5);
00082        int imageWidth = inputImage.GetImageSize().GetX();
00083        int imageHeight = inputImage.GetImageSize().GetY();
00084 
00085        for (int y = 0; y < imageHeight; y++){
00086               iimg::TBitmapIterator2d<I_BYTE> inputIterator(&inputImage);
00087               iimg::TBitmapIterator2d<I_BYTE> outputIterator(&outputImage);
00088 
00089               inputIterator.MoveTo(kernelHalfWidth, y);
00090               outputIterator.MoveTo(kernelHalfWidth, y);
00091 
00092               for (int x = kernelHalfWidth; x < imageWidth - kernelHalfWidth; x++){
00093                      iimg::TBitmapIterator2d<I_BYTE> kernelIterator = inputIterator;
00094                      PixelType outputValue = *kernelIterator;
00095 
00096                      kernelIterator.x -= kernelHalfWidth;
00097 
00098                      for (int mx = -kernelHalfWidth; mx <= kernelHalfWidth; mx++){
00099                             PixelType kernelValue = *kernelIterator;
00100 
00101                             outputValue  = m_predicate(outputValue, kernelValue);
00102 
00103                             ++kernelIterator.x;
00104                      }
00105 
00106                      *outputIterator = outputValue;
00107                      ++inputIterator.x;
00108                      ++outputIterator.x;
00109               }
00110        }
00111 
00112        iimg::CGeneralBitmap tempBitmap;
00113        tempBitmap.CopyFrom(outputImage);
00114 
00115        for (int x = 0; x < imageWidth; x++){
00116               iimg::TBitmapIterator2d<PixelType> inputIterator(&tempBitmap);
00117               iimg::TBitmapIterator2d<PixelType> outputIterator(&outputImage);
00118 
00119               inputIterator.MoveTo(x, kernelHalfHeight);
00120               outputIterator.MoveTo(x, kernelHalfHeight);
00121 
00122               for (int y = kernelHalfHeight; y < imageHeight - kernelHalfHeight; y++){
00123                      iimg::TBitmapIterator2d<PixelType> kernelIterator = inputIterator;
00124 
00125                      PixelType outputValue = *kernelIterator;
00126 
00127                      kernelIterator.y -= kernelHalfHeight;
00128 
00129                      for (int kernelIndex = -kernelHalfHeight; kernelIndex <= kernelHalfHeight; kernelIndex++){
00130                             PixelType kernelValue = *kernelIterator;
00131 
00132                             outputValue  = m_predicate(outputValue, kernelValue);
00133 
00134                             ++kernelIterator.y;
00135                      }
00136 
00137                      *outputIterator = outputValue;
00138                      ++inputIterator.y;
00139                      ++outputIterator.y;
00140               }
00141        }
00142 
00143        return retVal;
00144 }
